badges.label: Official
badges.description: Licensed, authorized content directly from publishers.

badges.label: Scanlator
badges.description: Content translated by fan groups or unofficial teams.

badges.label: Aggregator
badges.description: Sites that collect content from other sources, typically without original translations or permissions.

badges.label: Safe
badges.description: General content, safe for all audiences.

badges.label: Mature
badges.description: Content suitable for older audiences, may include mild suggestive themes, partial nudity, or some violence, but not explicit.

badges.label: Adult
badges.description: Explicit content, including pornographic manga, adult fanfiction, and explicit themes.

badges.label: Manga
badges.description: Japanese comic-style works.

badges.label: Webtoon
badges.description: Vertical-scrolling comics, typically from Korea.

badges.label: Comics
badges.description: Western-style comics, typically from the U.S. and Europe.

badges.label: Light Novel
badges.description: Japanese novels, often illustrated with manga-style art.

badges.label: Novel
badges.description: Prose-based works, not illustrated.

badges.label: Web Novel
badges.description: Novels published online, often in serialized format.

badges.label: Doujinshi
badges.description: Fan-made manga/comics, typically based on existing series or original works, can be adult or general.

badges.label: Fanfiction
badges.description: Fan-created stories, typically not illustrated, can be adult or general.

badges.label: Multi Language
badges.description: Offers content in multiple languages.

badges.label: Official Simul
badges.description: The official release or a release simultaneous with it, typically from authorized sources.

badges.label: Fast Release
badges.description: Content released within a few hours of the original source.

badges.label: Regular Release
badges.description: Content released within 12 hours of the original source.

badges.label: Slow Release
badges.description: Content released 24+ hours after the original source.

badges.label: Good Images
badges.description: High resolution with minimal compression, clear and crisp images.

badges.label: Ok Images
badges.description: Standard resolution with moderate compression, decent quality but not sharp.

badges.label: Bad Images
badges.description: Low resolution with high compression, pixelated or blurry images.

badges.label: Good Translations
badges.description: Professionally translated and typeset, minimal errors, and proper formatting.

badges.label: Ok Translations
badges.description: Some minor errors or awkward phrasing but generally understandable.

badges.label: Bad Translations
badges.description: Noticeable translation issues or poorly done typesetting, making it hard to read.

badges.label: Machine Translations
badges.description: Content translated automatically using machine translation tools, often with significant errors or awkward phrasing and no typesetting.

badges.label: Raw Content
badges.description: No translation or typesetting done, raw scans with original text.
